name: Suspension of booking of international mails destined to Sudan

details.Subject: Suspension of booking of international mails destined to Sudan.
details.Reason: Due to the prevailing geopolitical situation in the Middle East; cancellation of flights, and lack of alternative transmission channels for international mail.
details.Action Taken: All categories of international mail to Sudan have been suspended with immediate effect until further notice.

name: Suspension of booking of international mails destined to Sudan

details.Published by: Government of India, Ministry of Communications, Department of Posts
details.Office Address: Dak Bhawan, Sansad Marg, New Delhi-110001
details.Contact Person: Nee Ss (Himanshu Chaudhary), Assistant Director General (IM)
